questions.quote: Depends on how nice the person was. But you gotta figure, even Oswald took forty-five minutes.

He gave my son a pen, and then he takes it back. Tell them about that!
It's been a terrible situation down there the past couple of days. He's really been making things uncomfortable for me. There's always a big pile of dirty towels in front of my locker ...
Well it's a lesson for the kids out there. Anything's possible. Jeromy, I have *hit* the jackpot. The perfect man. Nothing but sex and shopping.
There's no need to get excited. Can't we discuss this like gentlemen?
The membranes get dried and it just starts bleeding. Since I was a kid so I have to stick tissue up there
